Message:
But, I woke up to
an unbelievable sight—
the world had returned
back to normal.

It’s said to be a miracle
brought about by a single staff
of a single human being.

Just what exactly would
I have to sacrifice to attain
that level of power...?

He and his friends were on
a journey to save the world,
searching for the source
of the black flames,
which he called the “Curse.”

I have an idea on where to
find Commander Paladea.
But...

Once I see her,
what should I do?

I’d always admired her.
Becoming her was my ambition.
She was everything to me,
and yet...

It was Commander Paladea
who destroyed the world.

From this point,
what should I believe in...?
What is it that I should
be fighting for...?

My heart wavers as
I continue walking with
the man and his friends.

My cannon had finally
stopped responding to me.
